summary: A small save to imply you are an ancient nord. Asger being the name
descriptionHtml: You have always served your Dragon masters well, learning a few shouts even. you, Asger guarded Lok gro lingraav for 12 years, but on a fateful day you heard bad news. a rebellion has started against the dragons. but you stay loyal and continue to guard Lok gro lingraav, until an attack by a small band of wizards leads to a most unusual spell being cast on you. you wake up dazed and confused finding your fort in ruins you hear voices down below, but they speak a language unknown to you voice and sword at the ready you can tell they are no friend to you....Or you know what ever else fake story floats your boat.
author: Sahlkonir0
